text: Manuel Pérez Flores (born 22 January 1980) is a retired Mexican footballer who played as a Midfielder. ==Career== He is known as El Tripa to team mates and fans alike. He began playing in the Primera División with Club Atlas in the 2001-2002 season until his move in 2007 to Rayados de Monterrey in 2007. Pérez is known for his great passing abilities and his outstanding mid-range shots.
